| History                 = The '''High Seers of Nox''' resided in a [[Glossary:Pocket Dimension|pocket dimension]],{{r|Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z Vol 1 12|; Mystic Dimensions - From the Journals of Ian McNee: The [[Archipelago of Anguish and Redemption|Splinter Realms (The Dark Dimension, the Archipelago of Anguish and Redemption)]], The [[Veils of Valtorr]]'s entry}} seemingly ruled by them and set in the [[Archipelago of Anguish and Redemption|Splinter Realms]], as they were among the [[Lords of the Splinter Realms (Earth-616)|Lords of the Splinter Realms]],{{r|Magik #3}} and were the vassals of [[Valtorr (Earth-616)|Valtorr]]. They gazed into Valtorr's noxious vapors to see possible futures.{{r|Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z Vol 1 12|; Mystic Dimensions - From the Journals of Ian McNee: The [[Archipelago of Anguish and Redemption|Splinter Realms (The Dark Dimension, the Archipelago of Anguish and Redemption)]], The [[Veils of Valtorr]]'s entry}}

They came to the convocation called by [[Jimaine Szardos (Earth-616)|Magik (Amanda Sefton)]] to help defeat the [[Archenemy (Earth-616)|Archenemy]].{{r|Magik #3}}

| Notes                   = * Despite their name, the High Seers of Nox are vassals of [[Valtorr (Earth-616)|Valtorr]], and have no known connection to [[Nox]]<!-- nor to Nyx, the Olympian goddess or the Fear-Lord --> so far.
